 \vspace{1mm} \footnotesize{\hspace{3mm}Power: 3W } \\ 
\footnotesize{\hspace{3mm}Comment: Jamming from A50, B50 and C50, with jammer H1.1, H1.4 and H1.5, L1, L2, CHIRP. HIGH PWR.

} & {\normalsize{\textbf{12:05-13:00 - 2.10.3 \\ Circle of 3 stationary jammers, 2 moving jammers L1, L2 and spoofing route GPS L1 and Galileo E1 only } } \\ 
 \vspace{1mm} \footnotesize{\hspace{3mm}Power: 4W } \\ 
\footnotesize{\hspace{3mm}Comment: Jamming from A50, B50 and C50, with jammer H1.1, H1.4 and H1.5, L1, L2, CHIRP. HIGH PWR.
The Jammers are connected to RHCP antennas to boost the power. Two additional mobile jammers
will be added H1.6 and H1.7 with L1, L2 NB, HIGH PWR. 15 minutes of initial jamming first. Then spoofing starts, same spoofing route as test 2.10.1 } \\ 
\footnotesize{\hspace{3mm}Contact: Øystein Karlsen (NKOM) } \\

 \vspace{1mm} \footnotesize{\hspace{3mm}Power: 5W } \\ 
\footnotesize{\hspace{3mm}Comment: Jamming from A50, B50 and C50, with jammer H1.1, H1.4 and H1.5, L1, L2, CHIRP. HIGH PWR.

will be added H1.6 and H1.7 with L1, L2 NB, HIGH PWR, and H6.3, H6.4 and H6.5, L1, L2. 15
minutes of initial jamming first. Then spoofing starts, same spoofing route as test 2.10.1. } \\
